posts.post_content: Pose number 103-3. Trimmed at the bottom $100.00 delivered. Sales tax applies if delivery in New York. I accept Zelle or check/money order, no PayPal. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations or requests for further information, etc. Please reply to my email address [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please check out my newly updated website including several new N172s below. Thank you for viewing.
